item.title: Soldier fell during the October 7th massacre and was taken h
item.description: Soldier fell during the October 7th massacre and was taken hostage in the Gaza Strip, Israel says

item.title: The change — which takes effect on September 3 and was annou
item.description: The change — which takes effect on September 3 and was announced in July — has angered some customers

item.title: "Harris is going to win because she is currently covered in
item.description: "Harris is going to win because she is currently covered in stardust. And if there’s one thing Americans enjoy it’s stardust," writes Dylan Jones Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk//comment/kamala-harris-donald-trump-us-election-2024-b1178779.html
